posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up a few n172 Kelly cards preferably in SGC holders but ok with PSA or raw. Let me know what you have got. Please send a direct message. 

Thank you!

Hey Danny

Are u still looking to add a kelly

Hello there my uncle own this and want to put it for sale in good condition [url]fredrickcooney7@gmail.com[/url] reach out to him for more information 
Thanks.

Hey, Keith Urban fan, we all know that your Uncle Freddy doesn’t even have a 1989 Gregg Jefferies in good condition. Take a hike!
